header: Agile performance powered by Microsoft Azure
content: Accelerate your organizational digital transformation by embracing highly efficient and simplified business processes anytime, anywhere. Whether you are involved in supply chain or sales order management, you need an ingenious software that will empower you to boost your profits at the lowest cost while maintaining transactional integrity and security in a highly collaborative business workspace. iBusiness empowers you to do exactly that so that you can stay ahead of competition. Features offered by iBusiness include:

items.title: Sales
items.description: Simplify your customer journey from creation to sales orders and invoice processing, payment receipts and matching.

items.title: Purchasing
items.description: Manage your suppliers from purchase order processing, approvals, inventory receipts, invoice matching to payment processing.

items.title: Inventory
items.description: Easily manage your inventory and maintain accurate stock levels to meet the growing demands of your customers and other stakeholders.

items.title: General Accounting
items.description: Complete all general ledger accounting with comprehensive set of ledgers and chart of accounts for accurate management reporting.

items.title: Administration
items.description: Securely manage your users in groups and roles to prevent expensive mistakes in your transactions processing environment.

items.title: Reporting
items.description: Get all the reports you need from sales, purchasing, inventory management, general ledger and system administration reports.
